content:
Certainly! Here's a template for a better README file for your project:

Subtacs

Overview

Subtacs is a tool aimed at developers to streamline the process of managing and tracking subtleties in codebases. It provides a robust console interface to facilitate efficient tracking and resolution of issues, helping developers maintain code quality and consistency.

Features

  • Efficient Tracking: Easily identify and track subtle issues within your codebase.
  • Console Interface: Intuitive command-line interface for seamless navigation and interaction.
  • Customizable Tags: Tagging system to categorize and prioritize subtleties according to your project's needs.
  • Version Control Integration: Seamlessly integrates with popular version control systems for enhanced workflow.

Installation

To install Subtacs, follow these steps:

  1. Clone the repository: git clone https://github.com/yourusername/subtacs.git
  2. Navigate to the project directory: cd subtacs
  3. Install dependencies: npm install
  4. Start using Subtacs: npm start

Usage

  1. Adding Subtleties: Use the console interface to add subtleties with appropriate tags.
  2. Tracking Subtleties: Navigate through the console to view, edit, or resolve subtleties.
  3. Customization: Modify the tagging system and configurations to suit your project's requirements.

Examples

bash
# Add a new subtlety
subtacs add "Fix memory leak in module X" --tags "bug, performance"

# List all open subtleties
subtacs list

# Resolve a subtlety
subtacs resolve 123

Contributing

Contributions are welcome! If you have suggestions for improvements, please open an issue or submit a pull request.

License

Acknowledgements

  • Special thanks to our contributors for their valuable input and feedback.

Contact

For any inquiries or support, please contact Maintainer Name.
